subject: Photography
title: Blue Hour: After Sunset
description: A short lesson to help you apply Blue Hour: After Sunset.

hook.text: After the sun sets, the sky doesn't go dark immediately. It turns a deep, luminous blue for twenty minutes.

buildup.text: Blue hour occurs when the sun is below the horizon but its scattered light still illuminates the sky.

discovery.text: City lights glow orange while the sky stays blue. The contrast between warm and cool creates stunning images.

twist.text: Blue hour is brief and unpredictable. Clouds can enhance it or kill it. You get one chance per evening.

climax.text: Cityscapes, architecture, and landscape photographers prize blue hour even above golden hour for its drama.

punchline.text: The best light comes after everyone else goes home.

quiz.question: When does blue hour occur?
options: Just after sunset when the sky turns deep blue
